::DarkMouse::

She thought about it for moment.
"Commander, I don't want to go back. I...I have to follow a commander 
taht I can trust and respect.  I can't go back to Megatron. I now 
that the spider doesn't like me, but, Your my commander."
She stoppped.  She knew that if she went to Megatron, he would 
eventually get her killed for nothing.  If she was to die, she wanted 
to die for a commander that meant something to her.  

"Commander, I will follow you and obey your commands. Please don't 
order me to go back to Megatron."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Talon Harvilicz <talon_the_rider@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Quickstrike:
>  
> 
> "Dang it, don't be stupid." Quickstrike said to Dark Mouse 
firmly. "Be good an' get outta here." 
> 
> He paused, thinking. Maybe she was right. Maybe it was better for 
her to get away from Megatron. He had noticed she was skittish 
towards him. "Dark Mouse, ya gotta know what yer gettin' yerself 
inta. Blackarachnia won't jus' take anybody. She knows me. Ah don't 
know what she's gonna do t' ya."
